title: What is the most expensive instrument in production today? - Quora
tags: What Is the Most Expensive X?

response.answer_text: In a very small quantity - quantity 2 - marketed to the general public on a daily basis, purchasable by nearly any billionaire anywhere, to sing whatever tune they wish... I give you the most expensive instruments anywhere: the two houses of our US Congress, the Senate and the House of Representatives. Boy, can they sound wonderful when properly lubricated and tuned up.

Typically concert grand pianos - not unusual to see them retailing for $75k or more, or pipe organs, which can be hundreds of thousands, depending on the installation. Generally not the kind of thing the 'general public' is picking up at the local music shop, but they are produced by large music manufacturers (Yamaha, etc.) in small quantities.
